website_summaries.verdict: All the weight and quality you would expect from an expensive set at a fraction of the cost.
pros: Classic diamond pattern catches the light, making the glass set shine
The all-glass stopper seals tightly to avoid alcohol evaporation
Black detailing on the stopper is aesthetically pleasing
Bottle is easy to grip and pours out smoothly
cons: Glass arrives looking foggy, but clears up easily with a quick hand wash

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I get many compliments on it and I can drink 4 drinks from a clean glass every night. My wife hates that I do it, but whatever, I drink to be around her. Way cheaper than divorce.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN SLOYAN

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, this product does not state anywhere on ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, this product does not state anywhere on box or glasses that it is 24% lead crystal. It is obvious by the thickness of the glass. I will say though that the box and static stickers on glasses say "Made in China". Upon receipt of this bar set, I turned receipt around and promptly returned...very cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Florian

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable option
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. My set is not leaded. They did a good job of concealing the seam for the glasses. Decanter itself is a good weight and the glass stopper makes an airtight seal ( I can hold it updside down without leaking). Unlike other reviewers, I would never mistaken this with for a "fine crystal" set, but it looks great and very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Vinh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, and for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and for the price, it can't be beat. Some reviewers have said that the glasses are leaded, while the decanter is not. I cannot say for certain, as I haven't had them tested, but I can attest to the fact that my decanter itself had a sticker attached to it (not just the package in general, the side of the decanter) that said it was leaded. Take that as you will.
customer_reviews.author: Ioannes M.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I see similar sets for much more money but this one is great. Have had used it a couple years now and have had no issues and it looks lovely awaiting use, and someone utilizes it at least 3-4 times a week so it's not like it sits in a corner out of the way.... overall great set! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Nice heft and design, FANTASTIC for the price
customer_reviews.text: While these look nice (and terrific for the price), the "well" of the decanter is uneven. When filled with a non-clear liquid, it is very obviously "slanted" at the bottom. Overall they are very pretty and not super thin and delicate, just know that you get what you pay for. Know your audience (if this is a gift).
customer_reviews.author: Molly Y

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is a welcome addition to my back door bar. The components are hefty and the style timeless. The price was nice, but the quality was much better than expected. I am very happy with this set, from the packaging to the crafting of the glasses and decanter. I will enjoy this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: RTfact

customer_reviews.title: You get what you see
customer_reviews.text: It’s what you see advertised. Nothing too fancy. Could definitely use a Teflon stopped because the top lid isn’t secured to the bottle, it just sits there. I almost Spilled my entire bottle when I grabbed it by the top alone.
customer_reviews.author: C.Scott

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations bought this as a gift for my son-in-law with a fancy bottle of scotch absolutely thrilled with the product and its packaging presentation is beautiful highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Renee Knight

customer_reviews.title: Cup Broken
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my product came with with cup broken. Everything else was beautiful and I bought it as a gift so I still gave it to him. Wish I had a full set. I know glass is touch to ship but the cups could use more safe packaging than tissue paper. Mike can’t be the only one.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebap

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband for christmas, he loved all the glasses and decanter were wrapped and packed nice and tight and they are a heavy style glass they all feel very sturdy and even when its just sitting there it looks very classy, i will deff buy another set as a gift for someone else
customer_reviews.author: victoria drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set, that I am proud to display.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: High quality whisky set
customer_reviews.text: Well packed and Looks luxurious on a display table. I bought it for myself but I highly recommend it for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Youngki woo

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - not so great packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for someone. Product arrived quickly. The overall quality is great for the price. The crystal is thick and made well. The recipient was very pleased with the look and feel of the decanter and the glasses were a bonus for him. Unfortunately, one of the glasses arrived with two chips on the rim and was thrown away to avoid injury. I would have rated this much higher if the fourth glass was not useless. Not sure if this is a packaging issue or lack of quality control at the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Drink in fine style
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, durable, and attractive. What more could you want? The decanter fits a 750ml bottle of whiskey with room to spare and the glasses are full sized ‘old fashioned’ or ‘rocks’ glasses. The pattern is an art deco roaring 20s throwback. Great set, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: martendobbs

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Crystal Decanter Set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and Elegant. This item was gifted to a family member who was pleasantly surprised when he opened it. Beautiful Crystal decanter and 4 matching cocktail glasses. Nice Cut crystal!! Impressive. Looks way more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality decanter and glasses. I like that they are 100% lead free and are safe to use. The looks is pretty great too. My only concern is the security of the lid with these weird plastic pieces they like to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Chrystal bar set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Purchased for Christmas gift. Was a big hit. Great price, and quality. Would recommend, as well as repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing set. Looks exactly like you wished it would. Heavy and gorgeous. Might another set to gift to my brother. 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lavenderhunnyyy

customer_reviews.title: Great calue
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my boyfriend and he loved it! It’s a great set especially for the price. It’s definitely not sparkly like crystal but it’s a nice glass!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift set
customer_reviews.text: 15th anniversary gift of crystal for my husband. He really liked it. The decanter and 'glasses' were heavy, beautiful, no chips or anything. It's a great addition to his bar.
customer_reviews.author: Felichia M.

customer_reviews.title: G Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This James Scott Whiskey decanter crystal set is gorgeous. I love it and so does my husband. We enjoy everything about it, the look, the touch, the way it makes me feel...
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: This bottle and glass set is extremely nice! They are very good quality, heavy, durable, and I will have the entire set on display and for use at my side bar.
customer_reviews.author: Joolzie

customer_reviews.title: Decanter
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my aunt and uncle. They love it. It's very stylish
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: A must have its a timeless piece !! Will buy again for future gifts !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a wedding gift but we loved it so much we kept it lol. Its elegant and timeless and we def use it !
customer_reviews.author: Mandie McFayden

customer_reviews.title: I like how tall the decanter is
customer_reviews.text: I like how tall the decanter is. I also like that there is not a plastic seal in the topper, to me it's more chic that it's all glass (might not seal 100%, but I go through my booze pretty fast so I don't worry about it going "bad") I can't wait to make some drinks and entertain with this set! Very beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy. Love everything about this set except the top is ill fitting. Looks beautifully displayed on my bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha31

customer_reviews.title: Poor molding
customer_reviews.text: You could see seams in the glass and there were also imperfections. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Dew

customer_reviews.title: Lead Crystal, label hidden under packaging flap.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: This is Lead Crystal. They hid this info under glue on the packaging. One star. Returning. Nice and heavy, thick glass. Looks like carved crystal but it's from a mold. Two stars off for a small bubble in the decanter glass and the decanter does not sit flat and wobbles slightly. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I got this for Christmas from my daughter and love it. So pretty to look at and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas from my daughter and love it. So pretty to look at and I can't wait to pour my first whiskey sour into it at my next party!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently only the glasses have lead glass, and lead only leaches after a long time, so lead poisoning isn't an issue. This is a beautiful set and looks sophisticated. I got it as a gift to myself and I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Glass cracks way too easily
customer_reviews.text: Honestly - with very light use cracks are already forming in glassware. Somehow the inside bottom of one of the glass is chipped already. Decanter shatters WAY too easily, and I mean shatters into the tiniest pieces.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and beautiful crystal set
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking around for a quality crystal bottle and rocks glasses, and the quality of these are above and beyond. They were very well and securely packaged, and the pride of my liquor shelf. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Product was exactly as indicated. Shipped quickly and in perfect condition. This was a Christmas gift and was enjoyed by the per
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as indicated. Shipped quickly and in perfect condition. This was a Christmas gift and was enjoyed by the person who received.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Cute and clean
customer_reviews.text: Well made and just like the photo. Boxed nicely. Keeps whiskey well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set! It's gorgeous and my husband is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Must BUY
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe i paid so little for this set. Its fancy and very well made. Real crystal
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Decanter and glasses are quite heavy and appear to be of good quality to me. The glasses are made thicker than one might expect, which adds to the weight, but provides sturdiness. While I'm not an expert in crystal glassware, I do think it is a very classy looking set. It was a gift for my father and he was thrilled to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful....except.....
customer_reviews.text: Set is very attractive, however when received there was a chip in the glass stopper for the decanter. How can I go about fixing this?
customer_reviews.author: Ron Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty I was very impressed as I am a Waterford Collector
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Patrice Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price and it classes up our ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it. Great value for the price and it classes up our dry bar!
customer_reviews.author: Savanah Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect secret santa Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a co-worker as part of a secret santa event, and he was very happy with it! The price for the product went up after I purchased it though, so watch the price before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. Boxed great so nothing was broken
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Boxed great so nothing was broken. Heavy duty and it reminds me of an old school movie having this. I did purchase this for my bf but really I'm contemplating getting one for myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC addition to my buffet. I will be getting another for my room!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. He loved it and looks good and classy with a nice whiskey in it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift and was VERY WELL received. Pretty, good quality, and arrived in great shape and on time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice whiskey set.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Arrived in a timely manner and was very safely packaged. It looks rather nice on my bar. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great value. It is lovely. The decanter seals. The glasses are sturdy. The cutwork is beautiful. It arrived in perfect condition. My only critique is that it is packaged in 2 boxes that did not match. The box with the decanter was a plain, unmarked box. The box with the glasses was decorative and had a description of the contents. I gave it as a gift set, so would have preferred that it was all together in one box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels expensive!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find a nice glass set for a reasonable price, but this one checks both of those boxes. I highly recommend and it makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: 8 oz. crystal DOF Glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to receive my new decanter and 8 oz. crystal DOF Glasses. It is everything I expected and have filled it with my favorite libation. I would love to find extra 8 oz. crystal DOF Glasses for my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Cotto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my husband and it is absolutely great quality. Came packaged very good. Pretty heavy and pretty to look at
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Great gift !
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loved his decanter set! We're trying to build out our bar area, so this was the first of many to go in that area. Fits one full bottle of whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boss as a wedding gift. Placed it in an antique crate with the fixings for his favorite drink and be loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie P.

customer_reviews.title: Not "AS DESCRIBED"
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this as a gift for me. When I opened it first thing I saw was that it is NOT "cut" glass as described. 2nd. thing was the stopper and decanter are NOT "ground glass but simply "molded" glass like the entire set including the glasses. Disappointed that the product is not what is described upon receiving it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: ARG

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Great for the money. Says made in China
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: but I love the look
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but I love the look! The item is sparkly yet masculine. I bought a 13" octagonal mirror to rest the set on (<$10). One thing I found after the fact is you can purchase this set that includes a mirror, for the same price. I could have saved some time and cash had I done a little more searching initially.
customer_reviews.author: Pookin05

customer_reviews.title: Nice set! great value!
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a graduation gift. opened it up to make sure nothing was broken. it was packed very securely and nicely. all the parts were free of cracks or scratches. the glassware is heavy, good quality. Impressed. would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ACrysFranco

customer_reviews.title: Several friends have commented on how great it looks
customer_reviews.text: The set is nicer than I expected especially for the price. Several friends have commented on how great it looks. Very pleased the the product and packaging it came in.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and loved the price! Had lots of compliments over the holidays
customer_reviews.author: L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: This and the Full Line
customer_reviews.text: I'm slowly building a full set of this design. This was my first purchase and since, I've bought two more decanters, wine glasses, goblets and hiball glasses. I would eventually like o have the full line.
customer_reviews.author: tomb523Top Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Glass stopper will grind and cause shards of glass to fall into your decanter. Unacceptable. It should have been designed differently, such as being frosted or just being better fitting.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, love it and aesthetically so pleasing to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, beautiful, love it and aesthetically so pleasing to the eyes, My Jim Beam even tastes better. John

customer_reviews.title: My product was terrible

customer_reviews.title: Got these on sale for the scotch lover in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale for the scotch lover in my life. Pros: very elegant, quality glasses! A bit heavy but can't wait to display it when I have more space!
customer_reviews.author: R.T.H

customer_reviews.title: Great price for solid feel and aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: For $40 you can't beet it.The casting is free of parting marks from the molding process and the glasses and decanter are bright and clear of cloudiness. The glasses are thick walled and substantial in the hand and the glass stopper seats in the mouth of the decanter really well.Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Will N.

customer_reviews.title: My own Mad Men office use
customer_reviews.text: Using in my office. Has a nice look for an inexpensive set. On the occasion I pour a client a late day office drink if single malt, it's well appreciated.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my boss and she was very impressed !! Very nice quality !! i may have to get a set for me too !!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set! I bought it for my husband’s birthday and he loves it too!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crystal. Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crystal. Exactly what i was looking for. Make sure to give it a wash before you display otherwise it can look dirty/dingy

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy. I got this set for my fiance for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well-crafted, thick, and sturdy. I got this set for my fiance for Christmas. He thought they were really nice.

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely beautiful and very well made and its very heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful and very well made and its very heavy.. I love you can put the top on without a cheap plastic piece on it. Gave it to my husband for Christmas and he loved it.

The etched designs are quite beautiful and elegant looking!

product_meta.title: James Scott Whiskey Decanter and Glass Set, Crystal Irish Cut Design With Ground Glass Stopper - Set Includes 1 25 Oz Decanter, 4 x 11 oz. DOF Glasses
feature_bullets: THIS MAGNIFICENT JAMES SCOTT BAR SET INCLUDES - A Decanter and 4 Double Old Fashioned Glasses

GIVES A DISTINGUISHED LOOK WHEREVER YOU PLACE IT - Perfect in a gentleman's study, this distinguished set gives pause to everyday life and beckons you to take a break. Whether you fill the stylish decanter with 12-year old scotch for a get-together with friends or orange juice after a round of golf, it's a happy and hospitable way to pass the time.

TRUE BEAUTY IS ONLY FOUND WHEN WITH JAMES SCOTT - The James Scott Bar set is designed to reflect the soft, glowing beauty of a magical countryside. This fine crystal has been handcrafted utilizing the centuries old traditions of crystal glass blowers and cutters. By strictly adhering to these traditions, this bar set is truly worthy of becoming a cherished family heirloom.

CRYSTAL BY ITS VERY NATURE, REQUIRES DELICATE HANDLING - With just a little tender loving care, you will ensure the beauty of your crystal for many lifetimes. Wash one piece at a time by hand using warm soapy water and hand dry with a soft cloth.
High Quality 24% Lead Crystal James Scott 5 PC Crystal,Whiskey, Decanter Bar Set.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars596 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
